title: 12/24/2020 - Best of The Herd
itunes:title: 12/24/2020 - Best of The Herd
description:
Today on The Herd with Colin Cowherd Doug Gottlieb fills in for Colin to discuss Bucks F Giannis Antetokounmpo missing a big free throw last night to cost them the game. Doug says Giannis will now be held to a higher standard after signing a super max contract and not getting it done late in games. Plus, Doug talks NBA and says Rockets G James Harden doesn’t understand leadership with his latest antics. Former NFL Scout and host of 3 & Out Podcast John Middlekauff joins Doug to discuss the latest around the NFL news and if it really matters if quarterback Tom Brady and head coach Bruce Arians get along in Tampa Bay.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
